DOC.brief_summary: The investigators hypothesized spinal stenosis symptom was provocation due to cerebrospinal fluid congestion.
DOC.brief_title: Cerebrospinal Fluid Congestion in Spinal Stenosis Patients
DOC.criteria: neurogenic claudication more than 3months relief neurogenic claudication by lumbar flexion spinal stenosis symptom by physical exam. who can walk more than 30 min. vascular claudication by physical exam.( ABI <0.9) structural change in vertebral ( tumor, congenital deformity) operation history at spinal bone metallic foreign body peripheral polyneuropathy
